data.text:
GONER RECORDS WANTS TO BUY YOUR RECORDS!

We buy LPs and 45s!

If you have Lps or 45s in good condition, please get in touch!

Cash paid daily!

CALL US! 901-722-0095 or email gonershop@gmail.com

Get these things out of your house and make $$$ doing it!

If you have a very large collection we can come to you!

We travel all over the Mid-South and possibly further for records.

Did you come across a bunch of records in a house-cleaning, or left to you by a relative? Do you have records that you don't play any more?

CALL OR EMAIL US!

********************************************************************************************

WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR?

We are interested in PRETTY MUCH EVERYTHING!*

Soul, Funk, Blues, Gospel, Rock, Disco, Rap, Heavy Metal, Jazz, New Wave, Punk, Folk, International, Oddball and Weird and all sorts of other things, especially Memphis-related.

Memphis labels - SUN, STAX, ERWIN, HI, METEOR, COVER, SATELLITE, and MORE!

We do buy 78s if they are Blues or early Rock n Roll.

*We generally do not buy Easy Listening, Big Band Jazz, or Classical. But we will look at whatever you have.

We can buy huge collections, or small batches. Or one record!

Were you or your relatives in the music business?

Did you or your family own a record store or distributor? Get in touch!

Do you buy storage units or clean out houses? GET IN TOUCH!

We also buy turntables and vintage amplifiers in working condition.

Sorry, no console stereos.

Also will look at Music-related magazines, press photos, and posters.

CLEAN UP! MAKE SPACE!

Get these things out of your house and make $$$ doing it!

Cash paid daily!

CALL US! 901-722-0095

2152 Young Avenue Memphis TN 38104

********************************************************************************************

HOW DO YOU BUY THE RECORDS?

We have to judge visually if the record and cover are in good condition.

Condition matters! We are buying to resell, and our customers are very picky. So we have to be picky as well. We are looking for records in as close to new condition as possible. Yes, we are aware that these things are 50 years old. But our customers are looking to play them, and we need copies free from scratches, dirt, and blemishes. Some rarities we buy despite poor condition, but in general we need very very very clean records. We will, of course, look at whatever you have. Bring 'em in!

WHAT ABOUT EBAY? THIS RECORD IS FOR SALE FOR LOTS OF MONEY ONLINE!

Ebay auctions are sometimes a good place to get deals on records- most of the time, however, the records you see are posted online are listed at very optimistic prices and the seller will not actually make a sale at that price.

Even if the record does sell, the seller has to stay on top of communication with the buyer, package the records correctly, ship the records out, and pray the post office doesn't destroy or lose the package. For most people, it's much easier and cost-effective to sell Goner records rather than try to sell them themselves.
